<sy:updateFrequency>1</sy:updateFrequency> <item> <title><![CDATA[‘The Good Wife’s’ ambiguous finale: Alicia sees dead people, but at least she’s got her life back]]></title> <link>https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/arts-and-entertainment/wp/2016/05/09/the-good-wifes-ambiguous-finale-alicia-sees-dead-people-but-at-least-shes-got-her-life-back/</link> <dc:creator><![CDATA[Hank Stuever]]></dc:creator><description><![CDATA[For a show that has prided itself on basic feminist principles and stories about the many strong, smart women the finale was oddly preoccupied with which man Alicia would end up with.]]></description><media:thumbnail url="https://images.washingtonpost.com/?url=http://img.washingtonpost.com/blogs/style-blog/files/2016/05/AliciaWIll4Ab.jpg&w=606&op=resize&opt=1&filter=antialias" width="606"/> <media:group> Press]]></dc:creator><description><![CDATA[Writer Katherine Dunn, who was famous for her novel “Geek Love,” died at her Portland, Oregon home Wednesday. <wp:uuid><![CDATA[c12a1002-0bf5-11e6-8ab8-9ad050f76d7d]]></wp:uuid></item><item> <title><![CDATA[The bizarre story of when Captain America battled Nixon]]></title> <link>https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/comic-riffs/wp/2016/05/11/the-bizarre-story-of-when-captain-america-battled-nixon/</link> <dc:creator><![CDATA[Michael Cavna]]></dc:creator><description><![CDATA[In 'Captain America: Civil War,' the title superhero is frozen during Watergate. But In the comics, he became politicized with this powerful 'Nixon' story.]]></description><media:thumbnail
